Final Blades (Age of Sigmar) [1,015pts]

  • **Narrative and Open Play** (Chaos - Khorne) [1,015pts]

    • Leader [110pts]

      • Slaughterpriest [110pts]

        Selections: Bless, Hackblade & Wrath-hammer, Smite

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, HERO, PRIEST, SLAUGHTERPRIEST, BLOODBOUND, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader

        Prayer: -, Bless, Blood Bind, Blood Boil, Smite, Unit: Slaughterpriest, Unit Abilities: Scorn of Sorcery, Weapon: Hackblade, Wrath-hammer


        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription Ref
        - In your hero phase, this model can chant one of the following prayers. If he does so, pick one of the prayers and then make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3 the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered.
        Bless 412"Pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit has a ward of 6+.
        Blood Bind 416"If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range of the chanter that is visible to them and more than 3" from all friendly units. Your opponent must move that unit a number of inches equal to the chanting roll. The first model to be moved from that unit must finish the move as close as possible to the closest unit in your army (it can finish the move within 3" of units in your army). Any remaining models in that unit must finish their move in unit coherency and as close as possible to the closest unit from your army.
        Blood Boil 416"If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range of the chanter that is visible to them. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Smite 248"Pick 1 enemy Priest within range and visible to the chanter. That enemy Priest suffers 1 mortal wound. If the chanting roll was 6 or more, that enemy Priest suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Slaughterpriest 6"685+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Scorn of Sorcery This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Hackblade Melee1"33+4+-1
        Wrath-hammer Melee3"D34+4+-1

    • Scenery

      • Skull Altar

        Categories: Scenery

        Unit Abilities: Defensible, Witchbane, Words of Hate


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Defensible This terrain feature is a defensible terrain feature that can be garrisoned by 1 HERO with a Wounds characteristic of 8 or less.
        Witchbane Subtract 1 from casting rolls for WIZARDS within 16" of this terrain feature.
        Words of Hate You can re-roll chanting rolls for friendly KHORNE PRIESTS wholly within 8" of this terrain feature.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Khorne

          Selections: The Goretide

          Categories: Coalition: Beasts of Chaos, Coalition: Slaves to Darkness

          Battle Trait: Blood for the Blood God!, Legions of Chaos, Locus of Fury, Summon Daemons of Khorne, Tireless Conquerors, Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning: (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne , (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, (03) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury, (05) 20 Bloodletters, (06) 15 Bloodletters, (07) 10 Flesh Hounds, (08) 3 Bloodcrushers, (09) 1 Skull Cannon, (10) 10 Bloodletters, (11) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne, (12) 5 Flesh Hounds, (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne, (14) 5 Bloodletters, (15) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne, Command Abilities: Ever Onwards


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood for the Blood God! You can receive rewards from the Blood Tithe Rewards Table below by using Blood Tithe points. You receive 1 Blood Tithe point each time a unit is destroyed. At the start of the hero phase, you can use 1 or more Blood Tithe points to receive 1 reward from the Blood Tithe Rewards table. Immediately carry out that reward's effect. Each reward costs a number of points as shown on the Blood Tithe Rewards table, and you can only receive a reward if you have enough Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. Note that Blood Tithe points can be spent to receive the Spelleater Curse reward at any point during the hero phase, instead of at the start of the hero phase. If you choose a reward, after resolving its effect your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero.
        Legions of Chaos A Blades of Khorne army can include coalition units (see below) as follows:

        - 2 in every 4 units in the army can be a coalition unit from the Slaves to Darkness faction that has the MARK OF CHAOS keyword. Those units must be given the KHORNE Mark of Chaos keyword.

        - 1 in every 4 units in the army can be a coalition unit from the Beasts of Chaos faction. Those units gain the KHORNE keyword.

        A Blades of Khorne army cannot include coalition units with the SLAANESH, TZEENTCH, or WIZARD keyword.
        Locus of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly KHORNE DAEMON units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly KHORNE DAEMON HEROES, or wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE GREATER DAEMONS.
        Summon Daemons of Khorne You can summon units of KHORNE DAEMONS to the battlefield by expending Blood Tithe points. If you have 2 or more Blood Tithe points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one unit from the list below onto the battlefield, and add it to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. If you summon a unit in this manner, your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero immediately after the unit has been set up (you cannot save any Blood Tithe points you did not use). Units summoned in this way must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly KHORNE HERO or SKULL ALTAR and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Tireless Conquerors You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly GORETIDE MORTAL units wholly within 12" of an objective marker.
        Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended Reward Ref
        1 Bloody Exemplar: You receive 1 command point.
        2 Spelleater Curse: Choose this reward immediately after a WIZARD has cast a spell anywhere on the battlefield, before any attempts to unbind that spell are made. That spell is not successfully cast.
        3 Murderlust: Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit; that unit can make a normal move. If it is within 12" of an enemy model, it can either make a normal move or attempt to make a charge move.
        4 Apoplectic Frenzy: Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit within 3" of an enemy unit. That KHORNE unit can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        5 Brass Skull Meteor: Pick 1 unit anywhere on the battlefield, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, roll a dice for each unit within 8" of that unit; on a 3+ the unit being rolled for suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6, the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        6 Relentless Fury: Until your next hero phase, each time a friendly KHORNE model is slain in the combat phase, before the model is removed from play, it can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        7 Crimson Rain: You can choose this reward once per battle. Immediately after you do so, and at the start of each of your subsequent hero phases, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to each friendly KHORNE unit on the battlefield.
        8 Slaughter Triumphant: You can choose this reward once per battle. After you do so, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly KHORNE unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound roll and save roll for each hit.
        Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne 16
        (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster 8
        (03) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage 8
        (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury 8
        (05) 20 Bloodletters 7
        (06) 15 Bloodletters 6
        (07) 10 Flesh Hounds 6
        (08) 3 Bloodcrushers 5
        (09) 1 Skull Cannon 5
        (10) 10 Bloodletters 4
        (11) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne 4
        (12) 5 Flesh Hounds 4
        (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne 3
        (14) 5 Bloodletters 2
        (15) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne 2
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Ever Onwards You can use this command ability before you make a run roll for 1 friendly GORETIDE BLOODREAVERS or GORETIDE BLOOD WARRIORS unit wholly within 16" of a friendly model with this command ability. If you do so, that run roll is treated as being 6. In addition, that unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

    • Game Options

      • Battle Tactics

        Categories: Game Options

        Battle Tactic: Aggressive Expansion, Bring It Down!, Broken Ranks, Conquer, Ferocious Advance, Monstrous Takeover, Savage Spearhead, Slay the Warlord


        Battle Tactic Description Ref
        Aggressive Expansion When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 2 objective markers on the battlefield that are not wholly within your territory. You complete this battle tactic if you control both objective markers at the end of this turn.
        Bring It Down! When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 enemy MONSTER on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that enemy MONSTER was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.
        Broken Ranks When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 Battleline unit from your opponent’s starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that unit was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.
        Conquer When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield that your opponent controls. You complete this battle tactic if you control that objective marker at the end of this turn.
        Ferocious Advance When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 3 different units from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if all of the units you picked run in the following movement phase and finish that run within 3" of each other. If all 3 of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
        Monstrous Takeover When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 MONSTER from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that MONSTER is contesting an objective marker that you control at the end of this turn, and that objective marker is not contested by an enemy MONSTER.
        Savage Spearhead You complete this battle tactic if there are 2 or more units from your starting army wholly within your opponent’s territory at the end of this turn. If 2 or more of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
        Slay the Warlord You complete this battle tactic if the model chosen to be your opponent’s general is slain during this turn. If that model was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.

      • Game Type

        Selections: 1000 Points - Vanguard

        Categories: Game Options, Vanguard

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Predator's Domain

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Predator's Domain


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Predator's Domain When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if you control more terrain features than your opponent.

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Ghur

        Categories: Game Options

        Command Abilities: Feral Roar, Special Rules: Predators and Prey, Seismic Shift, Spell: Metamorphosis


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Feral Roar You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. The unit that receives the command must be a MONSTER. Until the end of that phase, when you look up a value on that unit's damage table, it is treated as if it has suffered 0 wounds.
        Special Rules Description Ref
        Predators and Prey Once per battle round, you score 1 additional victory point if any enemy MONSTERS were slain in that battle round.
        Seismic Shift At the start of the third battle round, after the players roll off to determine who has the first turn, the player taking the second turn in that battle round can pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield and remove it from play.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Metamorphosis 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly HERO that is not a MONSTER and that is within range and visible to the caster. That HERO gains the MONSTER keyword until your next hero phase.

      • Realm of Origin

        Selections: Origin: Chamon

        Categories: Game Options

      • Triumphs

        Selections: Bloodthirsty

        Categories: Game Options, Triumph

        Triumph: Bloodthirsty


        Triumph Description Ref
        Bloodthirsty Once per battle, after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit, you can say that it is bloodthirsty. If you do so, you can re-roll that charge roll.

    • Warscroll Battalion [905pts]

      • Battalion: Goreblade Warband (Open Play) [Khorne Starter Set Battalion] [905pts]

        Categories: Warscroll Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Blood Rivals, Khorne Cares Not From Whence The Blood Flows

        • Blood Warriors [210pts]

          Selections: 10 Blood Warriors [210pts], Goreaxe and Gorefist, Goreglaives, Icon Bearer

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOOD WARRIORS, Battleline, BLOODBOUND

          Unit: Blood Warrior, Unit Abilities: Chaos Champion, Gorefists, Icon Bearers, No Respite, Weapon: Goreaxe, Goreglaive

        • Bloodreavers [240pts]

          Selections: 30 Bloodreavers [80pts], Hornblowers, Icon Bearers, Reaver Blades, 2x Reinforced [160pts]

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODREAVERS, Battleline, BLOODBOUND, Reinforced

          Unit: Bloodreaver, Unit Abilities: Chieftain, Frenzied Devotion, Hornblowers, Icon Bearers, Reaver Blades, Weapon: Reaver Blades

        • Bloodsecrator [125pts]

          Selections: 1. Banner of Rage, Ensorcelled Axe

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, HERO, TOTEM, BLOODSECRATOR, BLOODBOUND, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, Artefact

          Artefact: Banner of Rage, Unit: Bloodsecrator, Unit Abilities: Loathsome Sorcery, Rage of Khorne, Weapon: Ensorcelled Axe

        • Bloodstoker [85pts]

          Selections: Blood Whip, Torture Blade

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, HERO, BLOODSTOKER, BLOODBOUND, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader

          Unit: Bloodstoker, Unit Abilities: Whipped to Fury, Weapon: Blood Whip, Torture Blade

        • Khorgoraths [110pts]

          Selections: 1 Khorgorath [110pts], Bone Tentacles, Claws and Fangs

          Categories: CHAOS, KHORNE, MONSTER, KHORGORATHS, BLOODBOUND, Other

          Unit: Khorgorath, Unit Abilities: Horrific Predator, Taker of Heads, Weapon: Bone Tentacles, Claws and Fangs

        • Mighty Lord of Khorne [135pts]

          Selections: 0. Hew the Foe, 0. Thronebreaker's Torc, Axe of Khorne, Flesh Hound, General, Skilled Leader

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, HERO, MIGHTY LORD OF KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, General, Artefact

          Artefact: Thronebreaker's Torc, Command Abilities: Gorelord, Command Trait: Hew the Foe, Skilled Leader, Unit: Mighty Lord of Khorne, Unit Abilities: Collar of Khorne, Reality-splitting Axe, Weapon: Axe of Khorne, Flesh Hound's Blood-dark Claws


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Banner of Rage You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly KHORNE units that are wholly within 12" of the bearer.
        Thronebreaker's Torc Ignore modifiers (positive and negative) when making save rolls for attacks that target this model.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Blood Rivals You can re-roll charge rolls for the Goreblade Warband if any of its units made a successful charge in the same phase.
        Khorne Cares Not From Whence The Blood Flows If any units are wiped out during the combat phase, you can add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of all melee weapons used by the Goreblade Warband for the remainder of that combat phase.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Gorelord You can use this command ability at the start of the charge phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly KHORNE MORTAL units wholly within 16" of that model when the charge roll is made.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Hew the Foe Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the general's melee weapons.
        Skilled Leader If this general is on the battlefield at the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 5+, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Blood Warrior 5"264+
        Bloodreaver 6"156+
        Bloodsecrator 4"593+
        Bloodstoker 6"584+
        Khorgorath 6"864+
        Mighty Lord of Khorne 5"693+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Chaos Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Goreaxe(s).
        Chieftain 1 model in this unit can be a Chieftain. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.
        Collar of Khorne This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Frenzied Devotion Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE TOTEMS.
        Gorefists If an unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit that includes any models armed with a Goreaxe and Gorefist is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Hornblowers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
        Horrific Predator Add 1 to battleshock rolls for units that has any models slain by attacks made by KHORGORATHS in the same turn.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Loathsome Sorcery Re-roll successful casting rolls for WIZARDS within 16" of this model, before any unbinding rolls are made.
        No Respite If a model from this unit is slain in the combat phase, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack wtih all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Rage of Khorne Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHORNE units while they are wholly within 16" of any models with this ability.
        Reality-splitting Axe At the end of any phase, if any wounds inflicted by this model's Axe of Khorne in that phase were allocated to an enemy model and not negated, and that enemy model has not been slain, roll a dice. On a 5+ that enemy model is slain.
        Reaver Blades You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for models attacks made with Reaver Blades.
        Taker of Heads At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by this unit's attacks in that combat phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this unit.
        Whipped to Fury At the start of your movement phase, you can pick 1 other friendly KHORNE MORTAL unit wholly within 8" of this model. Until your next movement phase, you can add 3" to run and charge rolls made for that unit. In addition, until your next movement phase you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit. A unit cannot be picked to benefit from this ability more than once per turn.
